name: Boo Break Shot
description:
In Boo Break Shot, Blitz dishes are coming, but keep off the dangerous dishes

By missing a shot, you will lost a playing life

Tap the screen and hold to control the barrel and release to shoot

Features in Boo Break Shot:

- Compare your score with other's in global leaderboard.

- Multiple Cart upgrades

- The lively and incentive sound

- Endless

- Facebook share

- Remove Ads

Really nice and amazing game, try Boo Break Shot now
